tool_description: This API provides real-time demographic statistics, offering a viable alternative for countrymeters or worldometers. Users can access various demographic counters to obtain up-to-date information.

api_list.name: Counter
api_list.description: Retrieve statistics for a specific counter selected from the 'Counters' endpoint.

required_parameters.name: counter
required_parameters.description: The specific counter to retrieve statistics for.

api_list.name: Counters
api_list.description: Get a list of all possible demographic counters available for retrieval.
